tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraph (id INT PRIMARY KEY, subject VARCHAR(255), predicate VARCHAR(255), object VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE knowledge_graph_nodes (node_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  label STRING,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeEdges (
  edge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  from_node_id INT,
  to_node_id INT,
  edge_label VARCHAR(255),
  edge_properties JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeEdges (
    edge_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    edge_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    from_node_id INT NOT NULL,
    to_node_id INT NOT NULL
);
